function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor indoor air quality due to lack of proper ventilation.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, especially for contagious diseases like COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems and air circulation in indoor environments.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with enhanced filtration, natural ventilation.","People":"Inhabitants living in areas with poor ventilation.","Owner":"Building owners, government health departments."},{"Description":"Lack of understanding of the connection between built environment and disease transmission.","Impact":"Failure to implement effective measures to control disease spread within the built environment.","Mitigation":"Education and awareness programs on the relationship between built environment and disease transmission, implementation of building design and operational changes.","Technologies":"Educational materials, online resources, building design and operational guidelines.","People":"Architects, urban planners, building owners, occupants.","Owner":"Government health departments, professional organizations."}]}
